description: Specifies the path to the loot table that determines what items are dropped when the block is destroyed. The path is relative to the behavior pack's root folder (e.g., 'loot_tables/blocks/my_block.json'). Path string is limited to 256 characters. If this component is omitted, the block drops itself.
